item.title: Error: Missing return statement
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

between the } } you need it to return a standard animation…

IE.

} return 406; }
but be warned, that would make all weapons hold like a two-hand when you are standing still

Read full topic

item.title: Error: Missing return statement
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

I really don’t understand whats wrong here, could some1 help me?
My compiler says:

client.java:3573: missing return statement } ^ client.java:3593: missing return statement } ^ client.java:3601: missing return statement } ^ client.java:3609: missing return statement } ^ client.java:3617: missing return statement } ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 5 errors

And it’s like this in client.java:

[code]public int GetWepAnim()
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333) // Armadyl GS
{
return 406;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334) // Bandos GS
{
return 406;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335) // Saradomin GS
{
return 406;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336) // Zamorak GS
{
return 406;
}
}

public int GetRunAnim(int id)
{
if(id == 15333) // Armadyl GS
{
return 1664;
}
if(id == 15334) // Bandos GS
{
return 1664;
}
if(id == 15335) // Sara GS
{
return 1664;
}
if(id == 15336) // Zammy GS
{
return 1664;
}
}

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)
{
if((id == 15333) || (id == 15334) || (id == 15335) || (id == 15336)) // Godswords.
{
return 0x67F;
}
}

public int GetStandAnim(int id)
{
if((id == 15333) || (id == 15334) || (id == 15335) || (id == 15336)) // Godswords.
{
return 0x811;
}
}

public int GetBlockAnim(int id)
{
if((id == 15333) || (id == 15334) || (id == 15335) || (id == 15336)) // Godswords.
{
return 2063;
}
}[/code]

Ty already
